text: The [[url:script_link_campaign_ivory_road]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_ivory_road}}]]Trade convoy[[/tooltip]][[/url]], led by #(caravan_master), has sold its wares in #(end_area) for #(pooled_resource.icon)#(amount). This trade convoy will now begin the return journey to your capital.\\n\\nThe demand for trade goods in #(end_area) is now reduced but will increase steadily over time.

[[img:icon_edict_council_of_burgomeisters]][[col:yellow]]Garrison[[/col]][[col:green]] Van de Kuypers in his Marienburg Estate where he handles affairs whilst leveling up. [[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_caravan_cargo]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Send trade convoys across the world via the[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_ivory_road]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_ivory_road}}]]Gilded Route[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]and navigate risks en route to reap great financial rewards.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_treasure_map]][[/img]] [[col:yellow]]Monoplize[[/col]][[col:green]] the rule over Marienburg and neutralise the Merchant Houses by finishing Van de Kuyper's item set.[[/col]] \\n\\n[[img:icon_rite_effect]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Impose[[/col]] [[col:yellow]]rites[[/col]][[col:green]] from your Estate that influence the course of Marienburg and the Empire.[[/col]]

[[img:icon_warband]][[/img]] [[col:yellow]]Convert[[/col]][[col:green]] mortal men of the Empire hired by House Den Euwe by showing them the ways of Tsien-Tsin using the warband upgrade system.\\n\\n[[img:bullet_tze_changing_of_the_ways]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Manipulate reality with the[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_changing_of_the_ways]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_changing_of_the_ways}}]]Changing of the Ways[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]to perform unique actions against enemies on the campaign map.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_caravan_cargo]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Send trade convoys across the world via the[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_ivory_road]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_ivory_road}}]]Gilded Route[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]and navigate risks en route to reap great financial rewards.

[[img:icon_cove]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Win battles at settlements or use the Consort of Shadows to establish[[/col]] Criminal Syndicates and Networks[[col:green]] and watch them leech from the world above.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:icon_slaves]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Capture[[/col]] [[sl_link:campaign_slaves]]slaves[[/sl_link]] [[col:green]]throughout your campaign to bolster benefits coming from any Criminal Networks. [[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:bullet_dwf_underway]][[/img]] [[col:green]]Use the[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_underway]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_underway}}]]Underway[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]Stance to traverse the Wasteland unseen, using your network of underground tunnels and caverns long lost to mankind.[[/col]]

Rite unlocked: Secretariat for Trade Equity! \\n A lack of regulation has caused several merchants to ignore vital trade laws and edicts. The Secretariat for Trade Equity could enforce some more stricter policies to tackle this.
Rite unlocked: Van Reeveldt's Boatbuilders! \\n The finest boatbuilders of the Wasteland are at your disposal to finish a prototype landship that can't be matched in both beauty and robustness

Rite unlocked: Breaching the Vloedmuur! \\n The Wasteland, situated several meters below sea level, can be flooded to by breaching a few dams. This will stop enemies advancing on the proud city of Marienburg.
Rite unlocked: Schemes of the Directorate! \\n Plot from the backrooms of Goudberg to weaken rival provincies, or bribe elector counts to wage useless wars against one another.

The directorate of Marienburg have been plotting in their backrooms, laying out the pieces for one of their many schemes. They have bribed a faction leader, dragging him to wage a war on their behalf.
The directorate of Marienburg have been plotting in their backrooms, laying out the pieces for one of their many schemes. They have breached the Vloedmuur, flooding all lands belonging to Marienburg.

The directorate of Marienburg have been plotting in their backrooms, laying out the pieces for one of their many schemes. They have bribed the secretariat for Trade Equity, stealing profits made on river- and land trade via the enforcement of complex taxes.

The directorate of Marienburg have been plotting in their backrooms, laying out the pieces for one of their many schemes. They have bribed the dockyards of Marienburg, ensuring their naval power outmatches it's equals.

With a majority of the directors either bribed, intimidated or persuaded to join the Van de Kuyper's conglomerate\\nthere's nobody that stands in the way of the rule over the city-state of Marienburg. From now on, every tax, law or executive decision is made by a Van de Kuypers. Jaan van de Kuypers is truly the informal ruler of a the proud trade-city.
You have established a Criminal Network in #(settlement.region_and_province)!

[[img:hkrul_dauphine_how_they_play_1]][[col:yellow]]Conquer[[/col]][[col:green]] distant lands in the name of the Emperor to gain valuable reinforcements from [[/col]][[col:yellow]]the Empire[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:hkrul_dauphine_how_they_play_2]][[/img]] [[col:yellow]]Hunt[[/col]][[col:green]] the[[/col]][[col:yellow]] Red Chaos Whale[[/col]][[col:green]] who haunts the undiscovered seas of the far East[[/col]] \\n\\n[[img:hkrul_dauphine_how_they_play_3]][[/img]] [[col:yellow]]Rid[[/col]][[col:green]] the oceans of[[/col]][[col:yellow]] Rogue Pirate's[[/col]][[col:green]] by hunting them for powerful boons or persuading them to venture elsewhere using precious coin.[[/col]]

[[img:hkrul_fooger_how_they_play_2]][[col:green]]Send trade convoys across the world via the[[/col]] [[url:script_link_campaign_ivory_road]][[tooltip:{{tt:tooltip_campaign_ivory_road}}]]Spice Route[[/tooltip]][[/url]] [[col:green]]and navigate risks en route to reap great financial rewards.[[/col]]\\n\\n[[img:hkrul_fooger_how_they_play_1]][[/img]] [[col:yellow]]Recruit[[/col]][[col:green]] regular dwarf units as a bonus for completing[[/col]][[col:yellow]] caravan routes[[/col]]

The Slave Convoy led by #(caravan_master) has sold its wares in #(end_area) for #(pooled_resource.icon)#(amount). It will now begin the return journey to your capital.\\n\\nThe demand for trade goods in #(end_area) is now reduced but will increase steadily over time.
